body_html: @twolodzko gladly. System freeze or lockup doesn't necessarily contitute a bug as there may be other cofounding factors in the mix. However, if a problem is observed consistently in systems across the board then it is a bug. We could potentially add warnings and messages after conducting some pre-checks.

body: @twolodzko gladly. System freeze or lockup doesn't necessarily contitute a bug as there may be other cofounding factors in the mix. However, if a problem is observed consistently in systems across the board then it is a bug. We could potentially add warnings and messages after conducting some pre-checks.
